title: Bulk User Provisioning
description: An IAM analyst must provision accounts for a class of 50 new summer interns.

tasks.description: Receive a spreadsheet from HR with the names and details of all 50 interns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has the source data for the bulk request.

tasks.description: Use a PowerShell script to parse the spreadsheet and create all 50 user accounts in Active Directory.
tasks.expected_outcome: All 50 accounts are created successfully and consistently.

tasks.description: Add all new accounts to the 'Interns' security group to grant them the standard, limited access for interns.
tasks.expected_outcome: All interns are assigned the correct, least-privilege access role.
